content.query:
--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹                 
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_DimDate
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO wwi.DimDate
(Date 1, DayNumber 2, Day 3, Month 4, ShortMonth 5, CalendarMonthNumber 6, CalendarMonthLabel 7, CalendarYear 8, CalendarYearLabel 9, FiscalMonthNumber 10, FiscalMonthLabel 11, FiscalYear 12, FiscalYearLabel 13, ISOWeekNumber 14)
FROM 'https://synapsedemos.dfs.core.windows.net/rawdata/WWI/wwi-dimdate.csv'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,FIELDQUOTE = '"'
	,FIELDTERMINATOR = '|'
	,FIRSTROW = 2
	,ERRORFILE = 'https://synapsedemos.dfs.core.windows.net/rawdata/'
	,IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM wwi.DimDate
GO
